#=============================================================================
#
# file :        CMakeLists.txt
#
# description : File to generate a TANGO device server using cmake.
#
# project :     MeasurementSystem
#
#=============================================================================
#                This file is generated by POGO
#        (Program Obviously used to Generate tango Object)
#=============================================================================
#
#
cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 2.8)
set(CMAKE_SKIP_RPATH TRUE)

# MAKE_ENV is the path to find common environment to build project
#
set(MAKE_ENV /usr/local/tango/share/pogo/preferences)
#
# Project definitions
#
project(MeasurementSystem)

#
# optional compiler flags
#
set(CXXFLAGS_USER -g)


#
# Get global information
#
include(${MAKE_ENV}/cmake_tango.opt)

#
# Tango Class list used by project
#

#
# Files for DeviceB TANGO class
#
set(DEVICEB  DeviceB)
set(DEVICEB_PATH  ./DevB)
set(DEVICEB_INCLUDE  ./DevB)
set(DEVICEB_SRC  ${DEVICEB_PATH}/${DEVICEB}.cpp ${DEVICEB_PATH}/${DEVICEB}Class.cpp ${DEVICEB_PATH}/${DEVICEB}StateMachine.cpp)
#
# Files for DeviceA TANGO class
#
set(DEVICEA  DeviceA)
set(DEVICEA_PATH  ./DevA)
set(DEVICEA_INCLUDE  ./DevA)
set(DEVICEA_SRC  ${DEVICEA_PATH}/${DEVICEA}.cpp ${DEVICEA_PATH}/${DEVICEA}Class.cpp ${DEVICEA_PATH}/${DEVICEA}StateMachine.cpp)

#
# User additional include, link folders/libraries and source files
#
set(USER_INCL_DIR )
set(USER_LIB_DIR )
set(USER_LIBS )
set(USER_SRC_FILES )

#
# Set global info and include directories
#
set(ALL_CLASS_INCLUDE ${DEVICEB_INCLUDE} ${DEVICEA_INCLUDE} )
set(SERVER_SRC ${DEVICEB_SRC} ${DEVICEA_SRC}  ${USER_SRC_FILES} MultiClassesFactory.cpp main.cpp)
include_directories(${ALL_CLASS_INCLUDE}  ${USER_INCL_DIR} ${TANGO_INCLUDES})

#
# Device Server generation
#
set(SERVER_NAME MeasurementSystem)
include(${MAKE_ENV}/cmake_common_target.opt)
